ofo:fullDisplayHtml.ofo:details:
1 bind (flere pagineringer), illustreret
Form: reparationshåndbøger
Serie: Owners workshop manual ; 4900
Opstilling i folkebiblioteker: 62.7221Ford
På omslaget: Step-by-step maintenance and repair
Models covered: C-Max MPV models:Petrol: 1.6 litre (1596cc), 1.8 litre (1798cc) & 2.0 litre (1998cc) ; Turbo-Diesel: 1.6 litre (1560cc), 1.8 litre (1753cc) & 2.0 litre (1997cc/1998cc). Does NOT cover 1.8 litre "flex fuel" models, or CVT og "Powershift" transmissions. Does NOT cover new C-Max range introduced October 2010
På omslaget: Ford C-Max 2003 to 2010 (53 to 60 reg) Petrol & Diesel

Does NOT cover 1.8 litre "flex fuel" models, or CVT og "Powershift" transmissions. Does NOT cover new C-Max range introduced October 2010
